body_html: I compiled TF 1.2 with GPU support for my mac pro. It runs fine so far. R1.3 is not really out yet, and it is a bit broken right now for macs. Biggest issue seems compiler compatibility. llvm/clang 9 is not really getting along with cuda 8 yet and some other stuff seem to be broken too.
body_text: I compiled TF 1.2 with GPU support for my mac pro. It runs fine so far. R1.3 is not really out yet, and it is a bit broken right now for macs. Biggest issue seems compiler compatibility. llvm/clang 9 is not really getting along with cuda 8 yet and some other stuff seem to be broken too.
body: I compiled TF 1.2 with GPU support for my mac pro. It runs fine so far. R1.3 is not really out yet, and it is a bit broken right now for macs. Biggest issue seems compiler compatibility. llvm/clang 9 is not really getting along with cuda 8 yet and some other stuff seem to be broken too.
